lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He described the present accord as a model for commodity agreements due to its being signed by nearly all producing and consuming countries and by virtue of its review systems and control over buffer stock management.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lim, in Brussels on a tour of Europe and America, said he had instructed Malaysia's representatives on the executive committee of the Association of Tin Producing Countries, ATPC, to draw up a paper on the matter.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Malaysia is to urge fellow tin producing countries to contribute more money towards research into new uses for the metal, Malaysian primary industries minister Lim Keng Yaik told Reuters in an interview.
